metadata.name: Blue Mind
metadata.description:
Blue Mind  1/1

Part of the Wish You Water collection, Blue Mind is a perfect send off. Inspired by the book "Blue Mind" By Wallace J Nichols, this piece embodies the element of calm we seek in the deep blue. Taken 50 miles off the coast of Oahu in waters that went as deep as 5000 feet, I was dropped off the boat to explore the baron blue. A galaxy of hues that traveled right to the receptors of my brain with solace and gratitude. It was a beautiful silence I have never heard before that moment. Lost in my Blue Mind was exactly where I wanted to be.

Photo taken circa 2016
Minted 2022

Comes with signed 20x30 limited edition fine art print
as well as early access to Thousand Waves Project.
